@harney_terry @daraobriain A chop of the ruler/the dreaded bata - all things you could usually dodge, unlike bullets. On the bright side, once a teacher slammed his fist on the desk of the girl beside me in bad temper. She was paring a pencil and all the splinters went into his hand.

@chlomoj They remade 'Day of the Triffids'?

@MeanieMary @LeeDrinksTea @christinaemoss Interesting how different schools are. I also started at 4. The class cried for ages. I tried to cheer them up. Our parents said they would come back for us after lunch. Why cry? It'll be ok. Our first teacher deserves a medal. Imagine facing 35 wailing children every September.
